entities.name: buckbeak
entities.description: Buckbeak is a hippogriff that has been sentenced to death. He is described as trying to get back to Hagrid and being referred to as 'he'.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is the gamekeeper at Hogwarts who is trying to save Buckbeak. He is described as sounding weak with happiness when Dumbledore asks for a cup of tea.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is the headmaster of Hogwarts who is amused by Macnair's suggestion that they search the grounds and forest. He suggests searching the skies instead.

entities.name: macnair
entities.description: Macnair is an executioner who is snarling at someone for untieing Buckbeak.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student at Hogwarts who is listening closely to the sounds outside and whispering to Hermione about what they should do next.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student at Hogwarts who is also listening closely to the sounds outside and suggesting that they hide in there.

relationships.description: Hagrid is trying to save Buckbeak from being executed.
Dumbledore disagrees with Macnair's suggestion that they search the grounds and forest.
